item.title: Eternity, 2025 - â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…
item.description:
positively surprised and i cried! wish the mechanics of the afterlife world were explained though. why are there red doors? why are people selling the different eternities like they make commission? why are the worlds numbered and connected via railway? they built such an interesting premise i reckon it couldâ€™ve been its own tv show like the good place.Â 

but letâ€™s be real thereâ€™s no way ryan and anna are a thing.
